MOU.action_hint_clipboard: Copies the path of this asset to the clipboard.
MOU.action_hint_create_article_asset: Creates a Journal Entry from the asset.
MOU.action_hint_download_asset: Downloads this asset and copies its path to your clipboard.
MOU.action_hint_download_create_article_: Downloads the asset and creates a Journal Entry from it.
Downloads the background image and creates a Journal Entry from it.
MOU.action_hint_download_import_asset: Downloads the asset and imports it into your world.
MOU.action_hint_download_import_audio: Downloads the audio track, imports it into the "Moulinette" playlist, and plays it for everyone.
MOU.action_hint_download_import_image: Downloads the image and creates a scene using it as the background.
MOU.action_hint_download_import_journal: Downloads all associated assets and imports the journal article into your world.
MOU.action_hint_download_import_playlist: Downloads all associated sounds and imports the playlist into your world.
MOU.action_hint_download_import_scene: Downloads all associated elements (images, sounds, tiles) and imports the scene into your world.
MOU.action_hint_download_scene: Downloads all associated elements (images, sounds, tiles) and copies the background image path to your clipboard.
MOU.action_hint_drag_actor: Click and drag this actor onto a scene to add it as token.
MOU.action_hint_drag_audio: Click an drag this audio track onto a scene to add it as ambient sound.
MOU.action_hint_drag_image: Click and drag this image onto a scene to add it as tile.
MOU.action_hint_drag_item: Click and drag this item onto a character sheet to add it to the inventory.
MOU.action_hint_drag_journalentry: Click an drag this journal onto a scene to add it as note.
MOU.action_hint_drag_macro: Click an drag this macro onto Macro Hotbar to add it.<hr>
MOU.action_hint_import_asset: Imports the asset into your world.
MOU.action_hint_import_audio: Imports the audio track into the "Moulinette" playlist, and plays it for everyone.
MOU.action_hint_import_image: Creates a scene using this image as the background.
MOU.action_hint_import_rolltable: Imports the rollable table into your world.
MOU.action_hint_preview_asset: Opens the image in a new window to view it in full size without downloading it.
MOU.action_hint_preview_audio: Plays 15 seconds of the audio track.
MOU.action_hint_preview_audio_full: Plays the audio track (for you only).
MOU.action_hint_scene_packer_page: Opens a new tab in your browser and takes you directly to the ScenePacker module.
MOU.action_hint_subscribe_creator: Opens a window displaying the instructions needed to access this premium content.
MOU.action_hint_view_asset: Opens the asset sheet, allowing you to preview it before importing.
MOU.action_hint_visit_creator: Opens a new tab in your browser and takes you directly to the creator's page.
MOU.clipboard_copy_failed: Couldn't copy to your clipboard! Your browser either doesn't support it or is blocking it.
MOU.confirm_delete_index_note: Are you sure you want to delete the index? This action is irreversible. Your sources will need to be re-indexed afterward. Please note that the generated thumbnails will be preserved.
MOU.confirm_delete_source_note: Are you sure you want to delete "{folder}"? This action is irreversible. Please note that the index will be preserved (it might be used in other worlds).
MOU.creator: Creator
MOU.description_index_folders: The table below lists all folders indexed by Moulinette. To include other content you own, add folders to the collection. Remember, if you add or remove files from these folders, you will need to re-scan them.
MOU.description_user: This page allows you to link your Patreon account with Moulinette. If you support Moulinette, you'll gain access to all the content from creators you support, as well as any free content available.
MOU.dragdrop_instructions: You need to click, drag, and drop the asset to use this action.
MOU.error_bbcsounds_connection: Connection with BBC Sounds failed. Please try again in 5 minutes or report it on Discord.
MOU.error_create_journal_format: Moulinette was unable to create journal article (invalid format).
MOU.error_create_journal_path: Moulinette was unable to create journal article (invalid path).
MOU.error_folder_indexing_failed: Folder indexing failed. Check the logs (F12)
MOU.error_gameicons_connection: Connection with Game-Icons.net failed. Please try again in 5 minutes or report it on Discord.
MOU.error_scenepacker: Unexpected exception while trying to download assets from ScenePacker.
MOU.error_scenepacker_required: ScenePacker module is required to import this asset.
MOU.error_selecting_asset: Something went wrong while selecting the asset.
MOU.error_server_connection: Connection with Moulinette Cloud failed. Please try again in 5 minutes or report it on Discord.
MOU.error_source_folder: Please select a folder to be indexed.
MOU.error_source_name: Please enter a name for the source.
MOU.index_folders_list: Browsing "{path}/" and all subfolders... please wait!
MOU.isnot_patron: You are not currently supporting Moulinette, so you won't have access to any content from the creators listed below.
MOU.meta_journal_pages: Number of pages in the journal
MOU.meta_pdf_pages: Number of pages in the PDF file
MOU.meta_playlist_tracks: Number of tracks in the playlist
MOU.mode_accessible_desc: Search all content you have access to. This also includes free content made available by some creators you don't actively support.
MOU.mode_all_desc: Search all content. This allows you to browse and preview premium content from other creators. You'll then have the option to subscribe and easily use the desired assets.
MOU.mode_supported_desc: Searches only for content from creators you actively support.
MOU.name: Name
MOU.reindex_hint: Re-index all content in this folder. Regenerates metadata but not thumbnails
MOU.scan_hint: Re-scan the folder for new or deleted files. Ignores files that have already been indexed
MOU.search_required: ↥↥ Please use the search bar above to find results.
MOU.settings_enable_players: Enable players to use the browser
MOU.settings_enable_players_hint: When this option is enabled, players can use the browser to access the content. If disabled, only the GM can use the browser.
MOU.settings_s3bucket_hint: If you've set up S3 storage and want Moulinette to download content there, please enter the bucket name (just the name, not the full URL). Otherwise, leave it blank.
MOU.settings_use_folders_hint: When this option is enabled, Moulinette creates entries (scenes, articles, etc.) into directories following the structure "Moulinette/[creator]/[pack]". Disable this option to have the entries placed at the root directory.
MOU.source_folder_notes: Select the folder to index. All compatible content will be added to your collection, including assets from subdirectories.
MOU.source_generate_metadata_notes: Extracts metadata from your content, such as the duration of an audio track, the dimensions and size of an image, etc. WARNING: Enabling this option will significantly increase indexing time. Each content item will need to be downloaded, potentially incurring hosting costs (e.g., AWS).
MOU.source_generate_thumbnails_notes: Generates a thumbnail for each image. This makes navigation much smoother. WARNING: Enabling this option will significantly increase indexing time. Each image will need to be downloaded, potentially incurring hosting costs (e.g., AWS). Thumbnail generation also consumes a lot of memory and could cause your FoundryVTT server to crash.
MOU.source_name_notes: Name your content source. For example, "Tokens by [creator's name]".
MOU.type_map_tip: Represents scenes (FVTT type) and maps (static images)
MOU.user_authenticating: The module waits for the authentication to be successfully completed. Check your browser (new tab) to follow the process. If the authentication failed, close this window and try again!
MOU.user_not_authenticated: You are not yet linked to Patreon or Discord. Please click one of the buttons below to sign in with your Patreon or Discord account.
